message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a special introductory price of $150. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it offers.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $100?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $150 is already a very competitive price, but I could be persuaded to come down to $130 for you. What do you say?
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. Could you possibly lower the price to $120?
